attributes.action: Amalgamate the regulations governing the wearing of earrings by service men and women.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In simple terms a servicewoman may wear an earring and a serviceman may not! After 21 years of service (RAF), and after having 21 years of sexual equality rules shoved down my throat I ask, ‘how can this be?’ 
I therefore petition that men and women in the armed forces be treated equally with respect to the right to be able to wear an earring.
